pageContext.claim: “One of the most dangerous and costly decisions from the WHO was its disastrous decision to oppose travel restrictions from China and other nations. They were very much opposed to what we did. Fortunately, I was not convinced and suspended travel from China, saving untold numbers of lives. Thousands and thousands of people would have died.”
pageContext.analysis: The World Health Organization advised countries in general against implementing travel restrictions in response to the coronavirus, but WHO officials did not criticize the Trump administration for banning foreign travelers from China.
